meanings.definition: The state of being subject to conditions or requirements.
meanings.sent1: The conditionalities of the contract were clearly outlined.
meanings.sent2: She had to meet all the conditionalities before receiving her scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The strict conditionalities of the diet plan made her crave forbidden foods.
meanings.sent4: The conditionalities of success often involve hard work and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the conditionalities is crucial for compliance with the rules.

meanings.definition: The specific conditions or requirements that must be met.
meanings.sent1: Meeting the conditionalities of the job offer was challenging.
meanings.sent2: The conditionalities set by the landlord were reasonable.
meanings.sent3: He tried to negotiate the conditionalities of the agreement but failed.
meanings.sent4: The conditionalities acted as a roadblock to progress in the project.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the conditionalities could lead to serious consequences.
